panels.title: Data Volume Ingestion Stats by {{data_volume_view}} and Tier

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_volume) _sourcecategory={{data_volume_view}}_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<value>[^\"]+)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<dataTier>[^\"]+)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<sizeInBytes>[^\"]+),\"count\":(?<count>[^\"]+)\}" multi
| where tolowercase(value) matches tolowercase("*")
| where datatier matches "*"
| timeslice {{timeslice}}
| sizeInBytes / 1024/1024/1024 as gb
// remove long categories
| if (length(value) > {{value_max_chr}},concat(substring(value,0,{{value_max_chr}}),"*"),value) as value 
| sum(events) as events,sum(gb) as gbytes by value,_timeslice,datatier
| total gbytes as tgb 
| total gbytes as tgbs by value
| tgbs / tgb as fraction

// *** THIS LINE rolls up small sources into 'other' ***
| if(( fraction * 100 )> .1,value,"other" ) as value
| fraction * 100 as percent
//|count as rows, sum(events) as events,sum(gbytes) as gbytes, sum(percent) as percent by view,value
//| sort percent



| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice,value 
| transpose row _timeslice column value

_index=sumologic_system_events "Health-Change" unhealthy
| json field=_raw "status"  | where status = "UnHealthy"
//| json "eventType", "resourceIdentity.id" as eventType , resourceId 
| json field=_raw "details.error" as error
| json field=_raw "details.trackerId" as trackerid
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "severityLevel" as severity
| sort _messagetime | count as events, first(_messagetime) as latest by trackerid,name,error,severity
| sort latest | formatdate(latest,"yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss ZZZ") as latest

panels.title: Ingest spikes or new vs 3 week avg by {{data_volume_view}}
Ingest drop or gone vs 3 week avg by {{data_volume_view}}

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "operator.interface", "collectorIdentity.collectorName", "collector.ephemeral", "collector.sourceSyncMode", "collector.collectorType",  "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, Interface, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted")
| json field=CurrentValue "ephemeral", "sourceSyncMode", "collectorType" as UpdatedIsEphermal, UpdatedSourceSyncMode, UpdatedCollectorType nodrop
| if(isNull(IsEphemeral), if(isNull(UpdatedIsEphermal), "-", UpdatedIsEphermal) , IsEphemeral) as IsEphemeral
| if(isNull(SourceSyncMode), if(isNull(UpdatedSourceSyncMode), "-", UpdatedSourceSyncMode) , SourceSyncMode) as SourceSyncMode
| if(isNull(CollectorType), if(isNull(UpdatedCollectorType), "-", UpdatedCollectorType) , CollectorType) as CollectorType
| where EventName matches "*" and if("*"="*", true, UserIp matches "*") and UserEmail matches "*" and if("*"="*", true, CollectorType matches "*") and if("*"="*", true,Interface matches "*")
|count by EventName, EventTime, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, Interface, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp
| sort by EventTime
| fields - UserId, _count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "sourceIdentity.collectorName", "sourceIdentity.sourceName", "source", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceDetails, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("SourceCreated", "SourceUpdated", "SourceDeleted")
| json field=SourceDetails "sourceType" as SourceTypeCreated nodrop
| json field=CurrentValue "sourceType" as SourceTypeUpdated nodrop
| if(isNull(SourceTypeCreated), if(isNull(SourceTypeUpdated),"-",SourceTypeUpdated),SourceTypeCreated) as SourceType
| where EventName matches "*" and UserIp matches "*" and UserEmail matches "*"  and CollectorName matches "*"
|count by EventName, EventTime, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceDetails, SourceType, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CurrentValue, PreviousValue
| sort by EventTime
| fields -_count, PreviousValue, CurrentValue, userId, SourceDetails
| limit 10

panels.title: Signal Generation By Product and Vendor

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_signal

| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| if(suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid nodrop

| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_vendor" as vendor nodrop
//| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_sourceCategory" as sourceCategory nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_product" as product nodrop
//| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_mapperName" as mapperName nodrop
//| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_deviceEventId" as deviceEventId nodrop
| if(is_suppressed=1,0,severity) as severity
| count_distinct(entityid) as enitities,sum(is_suppressed) as suppressed,sum(is_generated) as generated by product,vendor
| sort product asc, vendor asc

panels.title: Signal Generation By Product and Vendor - Last Week

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_signal

| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| if(suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid nodrop

| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_vendor" as vendor nodrop
//| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_sourceCategory" as sourceCategory nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_product" as product nodrop
//| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_mapperName" as mapperName nodrop
//| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_deviceEventId" as deviceEventId nodrop
| if(is_suppressed=1,0,severity) as severity
| count_distinct(entityid) as enitities,sum(is_suppressed) as suppressed,sum(is_generated) as generated by product,vendor
| sort product asc, vendor asc

panels.title: Normalized Records Created By Product and Vendor

queries.queryString:
(
_view=sec_record_audit  OR _view=sec_record_authentication  OR _view=sec_record_email  OR _view=sec_record_endpoint  OR _view=sec_record_failure  OR _view=sec_record_network  OR _view=sec_record_notification 
)
| count by metadata_vendor,metadata_product

| sort metadata_vendor asc, metadata_product asc

panels.title: Normalized Records Created By Product and Vendor (Last Week)

queries.queryString:
(
_view=sec_record_audit  OR _view=sec_record_authentication  OR _view=sec_record_email  OR _view=sec_record_endpoint  OR _view=sec_record_failure  OR _view=sec_record_network  OR _view=sec_record_notification 
)
| count by metadata_vendor,metadata_product

| sort metadata_vendor asc, metadata_product asc

_index=sec_record_failure*| metadata_orgId as org_id
| count as failed by metadata_sourceCategory, %"fields.reason",metadata_parser,metadata_vendor,metadata_product,objectType
| sort failed

_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname


| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorPath" as path
| parse regex field=path "(?<folder>.+)\/[^\/]+" 
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name

| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as previousstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| timeslice | where status !="Normal"
| count by folder,name | sort _count 
| where name matches /(?i)ingest|collection|collector|source|throttling|flex/

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard shows key collection information:

**Data Volume Ingest**
- the first section shows large spikes, drops and ingestion information using data volume audit logs.

For this section use the parameters to customize output:
- data_volume_view - there is one of these for each metadata dimension: sourcecategory, collector etc
- value_max_chr: this is useful if you have many long values for metadata containing unique strings
- timeslice: choose a timeslice for time charts e.g: ```6h, 1d, 1h, 100 buckets```

**Cloud SIEM Ingestion Pipeline**
This section summarizes signals, records and mapping failures for CSE forwarded logs.

**Collection Health Events**
Alerts, collection health state alerts, and audit trail of collection changes.
